200.description: Get all phone numbers available for lease

intl_sms.description: International SMS support (generally only T-Mobile numbers support this)

reputation.description: Reputation score 0.00-0.99. >0.80 is considered acceptable for all applications. <0.70 should be used for messages you care less about.

requirements.description: Entitlements required to lease this number

created_at.description: Date & time of when the number was provisioned

200.description: Get information about a specific phone number. If you lease this number, lease-specific fields (lease_id, lease_status, billing) are included automatically.

requirements.description: Entitlements required to lease this number

created_at.description: Date & time of when the number was provisioned

lease_id.description: Lease ID. Present only if you lease this number.

lease_status.description: Lease status. Present only if you lease this number.

end.description: Lease end timestamp. Null if month-to-month

billing.description: Lease billing information. Present only if you lease this number.

billing_method.description: Billing method (service_contract only works if active). Defaults to monthly.

200.description: Get all phone numbers currently leased by the user

requirements.description: Entitlements required to lease this number

end.description: Lease end timestamp. Null if month-to-month with no set cancellation date

200.description: Terminate your lease for a number
